summary: Follows the struggle of a Spanish professional cyclist to win a bike race the same day of his brother's wedding.
cast: Yô Ôizumi|Shin'ichi Hatori|Minoru Hirano|Hiroaki Hirata|Toshimasa Ichikawa|Toshio Kakei|Eiko Koike|Aikou Ogata|Yoshisada Sakaguchi
keywords: place name in title|cycling|based on manga
title: Nasu: Andalusia no natsu
